title: SMC_GroupReadTrigger (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GroupReadTrigger
Function block for reading the status of a trigger that
was prepared with
SMC_GroupPrepareTrigger
and assigned to
a movement.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axes

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment:
While set to TRUE, the function block continuously
reads the status of the trigger.

rows: The id of the trigger returned bySMC_GroupPrepareTrigger.

rows.Name: Busy
rows.Comment: The function block is not finished

rows: Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
Information on the trigger with idTriggerId.
